title.value: Example Immunizations Triggers for Public Health Reporting

description.value: This example set of values contains CVX vaccine codes that may represent that the patient may have a potentially reportable condition. These pertain to vaccines administered and prescribed, where the vaccine, coded in CVX, may be indicative of a reportable condition.

purpose.value: Vaccince drug names used in observations documented in a clinical record.

display.value: Carbidopa 10 MG / Levodopa 100 MG Disintegrating Oral Tablet [Parcopa]
Carbidopa 25 MG / Levodopa 250 MG Disintegrating Oral Tablet
